import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{BsArrowRight}from"react-icons/bs";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import"./ProductSlider.css";import{concatUrlPath}from"../../helpers/concatUrlPath";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductSlider=()=>{const[productData,setProductData]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProducts=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"best_seller_products"));if(response.data.success&&Array.isArray(response.data.data)){setProductData(response.data.data.flat());console.log(productData);}}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching product data:",error);}};fetchProducts();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-slider-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"marquee-container",children:[...productData,...productData].map((product,index)=>{let url=concatUrlPath('product-details',product.product__Name,product.product__ID);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-thumb",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://testfabrics.com/product_images/".concat(product.product_image),onError:e=>e.target.src="/default.jpg"// Fallback image
,alt:product.product__Name||"Product"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.product__Name||"Product Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:url,className:"read-btn",children:["View Details ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BsArrowRight,{})]})]})]},"".concat(product.product__ID,"-").concat(index));})})});};export default ProductSlider;
